name: KeepRollin
description:
A brave little dice decided to go on a platforming adventure.

It's (literally) up to the dice how difficult his paths will be!

(Made for the GMTK game jam 2022)

[Controls]

L.Click = jump

R.Click = slow motion

Middle Click = turn around 180 degrees

SlowMotion + L.Click = Slam straight to the ground!

Esc (Escape) Key = options menu (might need to press a few times.. Sometimes doesn't show at first press in browser)

Tip: jumping right before the dice touches the ground lets you perform air jump. This adds to your combo, which gets multiplied to your score!

Score gets added upon touching the check point.

[Objective]

Reach a certain score to spawn a goal platform!
